mapper.select: select c.cno as cno, c.cname as cname, uc.ucnt as ucnt from (select c.cno, c.cname from company c join users u on c.cno = u.cno where u.uno = #{uno}) c left join (select cno, count(*) as ucnt from users group by cno ) uc on c.cno = uc.cno

select d.dno as dno, d.dname as dname, u.ucnt as ucnt from (select d.dno, d.dname from dept d join users u on d.dno = u.dno where u.uno = #{uno}) d join (select dno, count(*) as ucnt from users group by dno ) u on d.dno = u.dno

select pj.pno as pj_pno, pj.pname as pj_pname, pj.popen as pj_open, pjm.pjmembercnt as pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname as pjteam from project pj inner join (select * from project_member where uno= #{uno}) pju on pj.pno = pju.pno inner join (select pno, count(*) as pjmembercnt from project_member group by pno order by pno ) pjm on pj.pno = pjm.pno left join (select pjd.pno, LISTAGG(d.dname,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY d.dname) AS dname from project_dept pjd, dept d where d.dno = pjd.dno group by pjd.pno) pjteam on pj.pno = pjteam.pno order by pj.pno asc

select pj.pno as pj_pno, pj.pname as pj_pname, pj.popen as pj_open, pjm.pjmembercnt as pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname as pjteam from project pj inner join (select * from project_member where uno= #{uno}) pju on pj.pno = pju.pno inner join (select pno, count(*) as pjmembercnt from project_member group by pno order by pno ) pjm on pj.pno = pjm.pno left join (select pjd.pno, LISTAGG(d.dname,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY d.dname) AS dname from project_dept pjd, dept d where d.dno = pjd.dno group by pjd.pno) pjteam on pj.pno = pjteam.pno where pjteam.dname is null order by pj.pno asc

select pj.pno as pj_pno, pj.pname as pj_pname, pj.popen as pj_open, pjm.pjmembercnt as pjmembercnt, pjteam.dname as pjteam from project pj inner join (select * from project_member where uno= #{uno}) pju on pj.pno = pju.pno inner join (select pno, count(*) as pjmembercnt from project_member group by pno order by pno ) pjm on pj.pno = pjm.pno left join (select pjd.pno, LISTAGG(d.dname,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY d.dname) AS dname from project_dept pjd, dept d where d.dno = pjd.dno group by pjd.pno) pjteam on pj.pno = pjteam.pno where pjteam.dname like '%${dname}%' order by pj.pno asc
mapper.insert: insert into project values( PNO_SE.NEXTVAL, #{pname}, #{pdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{popen} )
